Yes, WoS, that absolutely POINTLESS site if you want to get stuff for free.  Uploads are split into several files and uploaded at filesharing sites. You get only that much amount of data you can download from those sites, so by the time you've reached the 3rd file, the upload is removed from the file sharing sites. It's happend to me several times. Either that, or I lost track of which files to download, and quite that site all together.

Yes, you can pay $$$ for access to the VIP site, but then I'm thinking who is the thief; the downloaders or the guy charging money for STOLEN software.

WoS is utter crap. Forget that site. People come here spamming TPB by plugging WoS. It's obvious that site is in dire need of income. ROFLMAO.
